title: Tom Perez DNC Chair Election Upsets Grassroots Liberals

text:
â€” Anthony Harris (@TheRealTonyH1) February 25, 2017 I don't want to hear ANYTHING about "unity" or "resisting Trump" EVER AGAIN. Resisting Trump would've been rejecting Perez. #DemExit â€” Becky Meyer (@electricfire89) February 25, 2017 Think about the number of chances dems have had to offer an olive branch to Bernie supporters. They've rejected every. single. one. #demexit â€” Rigged, Inc. (@riggedinc) February 25, 2017 Yet Again, @TheDemocrats Have Chosen 4 More Years of Winter. @TomPerez has been Anointed #DNCChair by Elite DNC Representatives.ðŸ‘Œ #demexit pic.twitter.com/sfTb5774PU â€” UnifyLabor (@unifylabor) February 25, 2017 
Even President Donald Trump congratulated Perez on Twitter, appearing to acknowledge the doubt surrounding the new chairman's ability to unite the party before the next mid-term and presidential elections. Congratulations to Thomas Perez, who has just been named Chairman of the DNC. I could not be happier for him, or for the Republican Party! â€” Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 25, 2017 
Sanders congratulated Perez on the election, though he continued to stress the need for Democrats to change. I congratulate Tom Perez on his election as chairman of the Democratic National Committee and look forward to working with him. â€” Bernie Sanders (@BernieSanders) February 25, 2017 It's imperative Tom understands that the same-old, same-old isn't working and that we must bring in working and young people in a new way. â€” Bernie Sanders (@BernieSanders) February 25, 2017 The Democratic Party must make clear it will stand up to the 1% and lead in the fight for social, racial, economic and environmental justice
